overview: Can film and video coexist in the same film? Here, 16 mm and VHS tapes need each other in order to exist. Thanks to the transparent clear leader support of acetate of 16 mm, we can visualize in movement the materiality of the analog video support, stuck on top of the film, serving as skeleton and structure of the vhs tapes intervened. A film, a video? Both and none at the same time.
title: In Film/On Video
